titles.title: Dehydroepiandrosterone Abuse Reduction Act of 2007
A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to prevent the abuse of dehydroepiandrosterone, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 12/13/2007--Introduced. Dehydroepiandrosterone Abuse Reduction Act of 2007 - Amends the Controlled Substances Act to impose civil penalties for knowingly selling, causing another to sell, or conspiring to sell a product containing dehydroepiandrosterone to an individual under the age of 18 years, including any such sale using the Internet.
